content: I've been thinking about smart lighting systems for a while now, and I've already started experimenting with Philips Hue in my living room. I love how I can control the lighting from my phone. By the way, I just replaced the ceiling light fixture in my bedroom three weeks ago with a new one that has adjustable arms and LED bulbs, and it's made a huge difference in the room's ambiance. Anyway, back to my kitchen - I'm interested in the recessed lighting option. Can you tell me more about the installation process and any specific considerations I should keep in mind?
